title: Yuumi's skills looking invisible when onto Evelynn
body: Whose genius idea was it to let Yuumi's skills go invisible when she's onto Evelyn? Evelyn is short ranged so I understand her going invisible, but why Yuumi's Q with a long range go invisible? Literally get sniped by her skill and while we see nothing, the luden's echo pops with arcane comet. RIOT FIX IT SERIOUSLY THIS NEW CHAMPION RUINS THE GAME SO HARD

replies.body: If it didnt go invisible then it'd be unfair for stealth champions when yuumi is on their team. People can troll them by using Q to reveal their location so no, it should be invis.
Then by that logic her Q should be invis when the champ shes on is in a bush!
